column5: it was budget.
for montclair.

and, you know, whenever they say that they're firing due to budget, it could be any number of reasons that's just their top excuse because if a teacher has tenure and they say, you know, we're firing due to budget that. it's not a big deal. but if a teacher has tenure and they say we're firing because you know, we just don't want you anymore. that's a big deal. and before i got interrupted, the senior class was denied due to their class prank because they decided on friday before the weekend, they were going to dump cement down every toilet in the building.
